title: Introducing Australian football [Greek version]
creator_credit: Frank Bagnall, Australian Commonwealth Film Unit and Malcolm Smith
brief_description: The Victorian Football League’s 1972 Grand Final, between the Carlton and Richmond teams is the dramatic background used to explain the rules and techniques of play. Includes slow-motion and free-frame techniques, playing positions, rules, penalties and the five types of kick employed. Commentary in Greek.
